sentences.english: You want to find your sister tonight, I advise you to look in the Boylan Estate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚你想要找你姐姐，我勸你到博伊蘭莊園去找。

sentences.english: Borsig, through a spokesman, declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 博爾西希通過一位發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Eventually, Mumbo and his friends decided to ask the child.
sentences.chinese: 最終，馬姆博和他的朋友決定問這個孩子。

sentences.english: But the idea of Beaufort gnawed him.
sentences.chinese: 不過一想到博福特，他又變得心煩意亂。

sentences.english: A child receives a measles vaccine from a doctor at Bozhou, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 一個孩子在安徽省博州市接受麻疹疫苗。

sentences.english: My name is Lightning Bolt, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是閃電博爾特。

sentences.english: Hence the edifice bore the name of the Gorbeau house.
sentences.chinese: 這便是戈爾博老屋這一名稱的由來。

sentences.english: The second room houses the Topkapi Dagger.
sentences.chinese: 第二個房間收藏託普卡博匕首。

sentences.english: On coming back to Pokhara I started work on my project in earnest.
sentences.chinese: 在回到博卡拉後我開始認真的做我的項目。

sentences.english: He knelt down and leaned over Professor Burns' chest.
sentences.chinese: 他跪下來，趴在博恩斯教授的胸口上想聽聽她的心跳。

sentences.english: Severus had brought Professor Burns to the Hospital Wing.
sentences.chinese: 西弗勒斯把博恩斯教授帶到了校醫院。

sentences.english: A sea urchin is nestled in a coral formation off Bonaire Island.
sentences.chinese: 一隻海膽正舒適的藏在博內爾島的珊瑚叢裏。

sentences.english: And Ron seemed to praise Burns all day.
sentences.chinese: 還有似乎羅恩整天都在讚美博恩斯。

sentences.english: Michael tries to cheer her up, but is unable to make her smile.
sentences.chinese: Michael試圖逗她開心，但是未能博她一笑。
